archimate:Requirement.name: IM.1.5.3b: b) preparation (e.g. involving business stakeholders, prioritising what data to protect, selecting DLP tools and integrating these tools into an existing technical environment)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
